# May the 4th be with you!

> It's time to celebrate our beloved and time-honored saga. This is a day to honor those lost in the wars for freedom from the Empire and the Republic. To honor those lost in the Clone Wars. To honor these brave men, women, Mandalorians, Wookies, Jedi and more, we offer the following:
> 
> **50% off any Annual [NVMe VPS](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=32) (recurring)**
> Promo Code: *MAYTHE4THVPS50*
> Valid Thru: 05/04/21 (11:59:59 PM America/Phoenix Time)
> 
> **35% off any (any payment term) [NVMe VPS](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=32) (recurring)**
